select apply.* , CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, PLACE.* from apply join sub_category on apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq join place on apply.place_seq = place.place_seq join files on apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq where apply.status = '승인 완료' and files.files_type='poster' and sub_category.sub_category_seq = #{category} and CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN apply.open_date and apply.end_date order by apply.created_at desc

select apply.* , CAST(apply.created_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS created_at, CAST(apply.end_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS end_date, CAST(apply.start_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS start_date, CAST(apply.open_date AS TIMESTAMP) AS open_date, CAST(apply.updated_at AS TIMESTAMP) AS updated_at, sub_category.*, files.*, PLACE.* from apply join sub_category on apply.sub_category_seq = sub_category.sub_category_seq join place on apply.place_seq = place.place_seq join files on apply.application_seq = files.files_parent_seq where apply.status = '승인 완료' and files.files_type='poster' and sub_category.sub_category_seq = #{category} and apply.open_date > CURRENT_DATE order by apply.created_at desc

WITH RankedSales AS ( SELECT apply.*, apply.name AS apply_name, sale.sale_rate, files.*, company.name AS company_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY apply.application_seq ORDER BY sale.sale_rate) AS rn FROM apply JOIN files ON files.files_parent_seq = apply.application_seq JOIN sale ON apply.application_seq = sale.application_seq JOIN company ON company.member_id = apply.id WHERE sale.sale_approved LIKE '%대기%' AND apply.sub_category_seq = #{category} ) SELECT * FROM RankedSales WHERE rn =#{category}

WITH RankedSales AS ( SELECT apply.*, apply.name AS apply_name, SALE.SALE_APPROVED, sale.sale_rate, files.*, company.name AS company_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY apply.application_seq ORDER BY sale.sale_rate) AS rn FROM apply JOIN sale ON apply.application_seq = sale.application_seq JOIN files ON files.files_parent_seq = apply.application_seq JOIN company ON company.member_id = apply.id WHERE sale.sale_approved NOT LIKE '%대기%' AND sale.sale_approved NOT LIKE '%취소%' AND apply.sub_category_seq = #{category} ) SELECT * FROM RankedSales WHERE rn = #{category}
